action.content: Turn 0

You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the pillow on the table, the book on the table and the plate on the table.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a plate, a cupboard and a counter. The plate is on the counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.

> open cupboard  

(Note: The next action will depend on what is revealed inside the cupboard.)<|im_end|>
Turn 1
The cupboard is now open. The cupboard is empty.

> take plate from counter  

(Note: The next action will depend on the current inventory and the goal to place items on the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 2
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.

> go to living room  

(Note: The next action will depend on the description of the living room and the presence of the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 3
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a table, a couch, a chair, a book and a shelf. The book is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.

> take book from side table  

(Note: The next action will depend on the current inventory and the goal to place items on the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 4
You take the book. In your inventory you have a plate and a book.

> put plate on table  

(Note: The next action will depend on the current inventory and the goal to place the remaining item on the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 5
You put the plate on the table.

> put book on table  

(Note: The next action will depend on the current inventory and the goal to place the remaining item on the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 6
You put the book on the table.

> go to kitchen  

(Note: The next action will depend on finding the pillow and placing it on the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 7
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry, a hallway and a living room here.

> go to living room  

(Note: The next action will depend on finding the pillow in the living room.)<|im_end|>
Turn 8

You are in a living room now. There are a plate, a side table, a table, a couch, a chair, a book and a shelf. The plate is on the table. The book is on the table. There are passages to a hallway and a kitchen here.

> take pillow from couch  

(Note: The next action will depend on the current inventory and the goal to place the pillow on the table.)<|im_end|>
Turn 9

Turn 10

(Note: The next action will depend on exploring the hallway for the pillow.)<|im_end|>
Turn 14
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a bedroom, a broom closet, a living room and a kitchen here.

> search potted plant  

(Note: The next action will depend on whether the pillow is found with or around the potted plant.)<|im_end|>
Turn 15
The pottedplant is on the hallway1floor. The pottedplant is takeable.
